body: You are protected by armor made of force. This armor grants you an armor bonus to AC equal to 3 + your tier. This ability is an abjuration effect with a spell level equal to your tier. If this armor is dispelled or otherwise ended, you can reactivate it as a swift action.
name: Enduring Armor
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Archmage/Archmage Features/1st-Tier Archmage Path Abilities/Enduring Armor
